paper_abstract: We show that there are natural ways to make a fuzzy set into an enriched category, and that in doing so, some basic results in fuzzy set theory are applications of enriched category theory. Thus we argue that the theory of enriched categories is a useful tool for fuzzy set theorists. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Implication structures, fuzzy subsets, and enriched categories
